    OpenChatFramework Class

    Defined in: src/index.js:15

    Global object used to create an instance of OCF.

    Constructor

    OpenChatFramework

    (
    • foo
    • config.rltm
    • config.globalChannel
    )
    Object

    Defined in src/index.js:15

    Parameters:

    • foo Object

      Argument 1

    • config.rltm Object

      OCF is based off PubNub rltm.js which lets you switch between PubNub and Socket.io just by changing your configuration. Check out the rltm.js docs for more information.

    • config.globalChannel String

      his is the global channel that all clients are connected to automatically. It's used for global announcements, global presence, etc.

    Returns:

    Object:

    Returns an instance of OCF
